scripts.test: dotenv -e .env.test -- npm run db:down:test && npm run db:up:test && npm run db:wait:test && npm run seed:service:test && jest --runInBand
scripts.db:up:test: docker run --rm --name test-postgres-db -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=brigthe -p 5435:5432 -d postgres
scripts.db:wait:test: echo "Waiting for PostgreSQL to be ready..." && until docker exec test-postgres-db pg_isready -U testuser -h 0.0.0.0 -p 5432; do echo "PostgreSQL not ready yet. Retrying in 2s..."; sleep 2; done && echo "PostgreSQL is ready!"
